content: Active shooter 888 Bestgate please help us
They got him.
If there was ever a time to be more specific with a tweet this might be it bud.

His profile says where he works. Doesn’t require much investigation, and yet you want more details from someone present in an active shooting situation. How selfish. Tweeting about this isn’t a perfect solution, but neither is calling 911 so the shooter can hear and find you.

Please pay attention to who I was actually talking to. No one in their right mind would complain to the person IN THE MIDDLE of a crisis. I was talking to someone giving details on it.,pic.twitter.com/yjLaAECmjB
Fair. Sorry for the confusion.
It's all good. Thank you for being a decent human and reminding me they exist on this platform.
Thank you for not immediately attacking me with insults and profanity when I misunderstood! Twitter is usually good for that, even though it’s a breeding ground for misunderstandings.

Agreed. This platform could do more through coding to make context easier to follow. Threads shouldn't go straight down, but instead maybe at a slight angle so it's a little more clear how the conversations progress.
Why are you using twitter to call the police?  Don't act like a victim.  Improve your situation and get off social media.
According to what I've read, it was his tweet that got help.

Sometimes, it is safer to send a text or a tweet than to make a call. In this case, calling could have easily drawn more attention to his location, possibly increasing the number of people injured or killed.
Yep! Also if you disconnect before the call is done they call back, which would alert the shooter. Text/tweet can be much safer/effective than calling!
Sadly, this is advice we all need to know. Thanks.
Anthony, I hope you're safe and OK. I'm with NBC News. Here's my DM if you're able to speak.,https://,twitter.com/messages/compo,se?recipient_id=184537455, ,…
Are you fucking serious with this?
Like vultures.....
big ratings in active shooter situations.  you still wondering why they keep happening and nobody is doing anything about it?  ITS,BIG,BUSINESS

Yes, for gun manufacturers. The news covers what’s happening and interviews witnesses. That’s what the news is for. I get that there are biased news sources on both sides of the political spectrum, but it isn’t the reporting of shootings that prevents gun law changes.
If they get an interview with a man hiding under a desk it is a huge ratings boost. Ratings equal revenue.

I don’t deny that, but you make it sound like it is the profits for news outlets alone that prevent gun laws from passing. It is also gun manufacturers and the NRA’s lobbying and money, as well as politicians who care more about lining their pockets than people’s lives.
Anthony, are you safe? I work for WJZ. Can you give us an idea of what is happening inside your workplace?
I’m sure that’s at the top of his to do list at the moment
Please get to a safe place, if possible, before responding.
Kim-,pic.twitter.com/ltx9oo7Avo
Has he been back on yet Tracie.
HE IS OK!
Thanks I was worried about him.
News people leaving their phone numbers hoping this person will call them for a story,pic.twitter.com/v0DKAM1tVq
I hope tons of pranksters call them.
Anthony I am NOT a reporter. I am a prayer warrior and I am praying!!
pic.twitter.com/YhtQMlgkxD
If all people offer is prayer and then do nothing to help prevent the tragedy in the future it's an empty gesture.

Hey buddy. 

PD are on site, they are evacuating and searching the building. 
Stay strong. Lay low. They are on their way. 

It's gonna be fine.

The Relocation point is inside Lord and Taylor in the mall.

Go there.
Choppers have arrived. Don't be alarmed. They are just there to assist with evac.
Are you safe Anthony? Please get to safety- Can you tell us what’s happening where you are?
Really?

Dear Holy Jesus Christ..please be with Anthony protect him Lord please God we need you to deliver these people from the evil one 
Thank You Holy God praying in Jesus Christ Holy Name
Ahmen
Amen!
Hi Anthony. I’m not with any newspaper or TV. I just want to say I hope you’re safe.
Ditto
Absolutely
Ditto 2

You guys have to realize that alerting the media lets us know and people at home without twitter, smartphones, etc about what’s going on as well. Most of them are saying “when you find safety then reach out” they can’t do much else
Not to mention, it’s probably not safe to make an actual call to the police so the best thing they can do is quietly take to social media and hope someone will send help
I’m not wrong. Any officer will tell you what this guy did was good. Obviously someone in this situation isnt gonna have all the answers!! Jfc people are scared and running for their lives
(Has anyone heard back from Anthony?)
There are reports that he is fine.
Thank you, I appreciate it.
Here you go:,https://www.,theglobepost.com/2018/06/28/mar,yland-newspaper-shooting/, ,…
Wow. The media vultures are swarming.
No idea what you are trying to say here. Is a shooter at a news organization NBD to you?
I’m saying that when a man is literally begging for his life, the media can wait more than 2 minutes to say “Call me!”
And I thought ambulance chasers were bad.....gheesh
Anthony, are you safe?
https://,twitter.com/DTOhl/status/1,012425245427412992?s=19, ,…

Stay safe and keep your head down.

To the media people circling for an interview *while there's an active situation going on*, stop being a bunch of vultures. Thanks.

Yes, but they're clamouring for an interview/live-feed at *this* very time: in the middle of a very dangerous situation where he should be (and presumably is) concentrating on staying safe?

Vultures.

Their basic tweet message/tone: "I'm with the media, I know u asked for help & left the address so that ppl can call 91, but can u call us first? Or DM if its easier. u know how it is to be the 1st one with the breaking news details- I cant help u but u can really help my career"
I think they left the message with the understanding that he would/could reply when he was safe, not asking him to reply at that very second.

Doesnt sound that way when many basically say "can u dm/email me and give me details of what's happening right now" maybe the intention of some... but not the way many are perceiving it.  I didnt find any that said "can u please contact me when u are out of danger"
I'm not saying all journalists are the same. But the ones I know don't intentionally want to put people in danger.
I would agree with you Kaitllin... 100% ..I'm honestly just speaking of the ones who were commenting
cc: ,@,Emma4Change, ,@,davidhogg111
here we go. GEEZUZ, only took an hour to become political, kudos Emily
I know and the guy is asking for help and she’s signaling Hogg
Right ? FFS... About the stupidest damn tweet I've ever seen, considering the circumstance (saying a lot)-
nah niggi u on ur own this time
Wow shame on you with this tweet , wtf bro ??
Please be okay! Don't talk to the media until the all clear. You don't want to give your location away.
How is he supposed to get help if we don’t know his location?,pic.twitter.com/sNpMmCZjzM
Are you kidding? He tweeted the address. If he was live-interviewing for TV, his voice could attract the shooter, no matter how loud or quiet,pic.twitter.com/PUyxTeI5kL

Fucking vultures. This idiot is tweeting rather than calling police for help and so-called journalists who want to be respected are responding and asking for a story. And people wonder why journalism is not respected.
Yeah, if the shooter is/was right there or in earshot, I’m guessing he doesn’t want to talk or make any noise.
You can call emergency services and not have to talk for them to know you’re in need of help.
I can't believe that  media outlets are trying to scoop a story while this guy's in danger!
Sickening.
I don't know what's more disturbing this active shooter situation or the news people asking for a story from this guy.
#,CatholicTwitter, storm heaven now
praying

Im pissed. This man could have possibly lost his life and all they're concerned about is who can get the story first. Every last one of them are a piece of shit and idc if they get mad that im saying this.
Get safe. Don't text or tweet. Protect yourself.
Hey news media who think theyre entitled to a story when lives are at stake: youre a joke. Piss off and show some proper ethics.
His tweet may have helped save lives. More eyewitness information could, too. Of course he must put his personal safety first. That is implied.
Do you even know what my tweet was in reference to?
It appeared to be a condemnation of members of the Press asking for more information. Is that incorrect?

A completely justified condemnation yes. When your first priority is "give me an interview" before shots have even stopped firing, theres a problem. Also, do you HONESTLY Believe that the media want to actually help in the first place?
https://,twitter.com/senbobcasey/st,atus/1012426427709444098, ,…
They "risk their lives" to report propaganda these days.

You people who are arguing, belittling, and just being negative and rude make me sick.  Human lives were lost, others in danger and in fear.  Anthony my prayers are with you and all your coworkers.  Please ignore all these other idiots who aren't supportive or showing compassion.
I SO agree with you!
I think he’s ok!!,pic.twitter.com/Dvj61FlfWa
Thank you ,@,redhedbarb,

Anthony just hang tight. ,@,WJZKimberly, is almost done with her questions, once she gets her first edit done we will be calling the police, for their reports on 911 calls and then we will get a WJZ security office on-site to assess the safety of the scene for an in person interview

Absolutely brilliant tweet my friend!
Can you believe the nerve of these people from the media? 
A light should be shined on Soulless vultures like ,@,WJZKimberly

I already got no morals and what not so I can do this without flinching. This lady, she's sposed to be of a certain level of integrity. 

Thank you tho
Please be alright man
Hey Anthony, we are NOT asking you to contact us while you're hiding under a desk and fearing for your life. We just hope you are OK and praying for you all.
Like hell you aren’t.
Kind of seems if you can tweet during an "active shooter situation" you could call 911?  Just saying a bit strange.
Have you ever hidden from a gun man? I have and can tell you silence can save lives. Don’t judge from safety.

Yep, I have twice and yep, silence can be good. If I were to tweet, I would tweet the Police, not my followers. And you know what, if I am in a place where I feel I can tweet, I am in a place I can call 911. If I am not in that place, I am hyper aware and ready to move or attack.
So you tweet, rather than dial 911! ,#,Millinials
pic.twitter.com/GNtpzlrtdR
@,KneeDeepMedia, Why like this?

Because there are no other options to click on, so, I did so in acknowledging this dude for holding it together in the news room. I can't speak for the other 4200 likers though, but I imagine none did so because they actually LIKED the fact that there was an active shooter.
Jeez you don’t have to get all defensive. Don’t make me bring Tim into this.
I'm not getting defensive. That was more for anyone else who may have read it than you.

Please stay safe Anthony! Everyone with ,@,NYDailyNews, is thinking about you and your entire newsroom right now. When you are safe please send me an email at jschladebeck@nydailynews.com if you're up for talking about what's happening.
Hmm call 911 or tweet. Call 911 or tweet.... This generation tho
Yeah, if the shooter is/was right there or in earshot, I’m guessing he doesn’t want to talk or make any noise.
Yeah because during a shooting scenario its totallt quiet and making a phone call gives you away. How sheltered are liberals these days that they think this way. Amazing.
Doesn't one of you carry a firearm for self defense????????
It's a strict gun control area.
Doesn't stop me from carrying concealed.
Maryland is a "May Issue" state, so it's very difficult to the general public to get a CCW. Plus, the office is probably a gun-free zone.

Thank goodness he’s not physically injured.  Everyone involved will need extended support and love.  

thank you ,@,mainesm31, for letting us know.
Total stranger here but I hope you are okay. :(
Hope you’re safe.

Like so many others are saying, do not give your location away until you're given the all clear. I'm seeing from others tweets that they got him but I cannot confirm this. Turn the sounds on your phone off, stay away from windows. Stay calm.

CNN is reporting and the police are going through the building. No all clear given yet.  If you're in a safe place, stay there.  All other non official reports are that they have the shooter in custody though. Sending a prayer up for you, because that's all I can do right now.
Please stay safe. As for the media - wait until you find out he’s safe before asking him to go live. Idiots
I don't know you, but I'm still terrified for you. Are you okay?
Please stay safe, Anthony. And let us know when you can that you are ok.
Anthony, hide. We know what’s happening, hide.

Our prayers for all of you. Hoping to hear later on the news that's you're safe. Thank you for finding a way to get word out, that was very brave. Most of us understand calling 911 is not always possible (or quiet when you're hiding).

Seriously if you are going to be negative on this feed go get a hug and learn to love yourself. This is an emergency situation. I can't ever imagine the fear this man is feeling. Now is not the time to be petty!
Hope your ok mate ?
Anthony hope you are safe
I am so sorry you and your colleagues had to go through this. I hope you are okay. We stand with you and please let me know if we can help in the days ahead.
I hope you are safe! I'm praying for you all.
We hear you ...we are praying for you...stay calm and collected silence all phones.

We know the incident is over now.  BUT THE ONLY APPROPRIATE RESPONSE TO THAT MESSAGE AT THE TIME WAS TO CALL 911.  What in the Hell is wrong with you people?  You're going to pause to have a f**king debate about whether prayer is going to help?  God please restore your brains.
Goodness. They say they've got him. Stay safe
Please be safe. Let us know when you're okay.
stay safe. keep us informed. Prayers for all.
help is out side right now,stay safe,they are on it,its all over the news,,reach out if you have info, many will get it to law enforcement...
I hope you're ok. I'm sorry you are dealing with this craziness. Stay strong.
Are you ok?
Survive, kid.
Please let us know that you're ok!
Prayers for all of you.  Be safe.  Much love.
Stay safe man
Praying for you Anthony and your coworkers
praying. seek shelter
I'm holding my breath for you, man. I hope you're okay.

Oh my God.  Seriously guys, can u stop being so sarcastic and inhuman.  We get it, everyone is jaded and angry.  This individual was literally in a life or death situation and was reaching out for help.  I’m so sorry Anthony. I hope your ok.
My husband says massive police force on route 50.
Maybe David Hogg can help on his bike
I desperately hope you’re ok Anthony.
Please confirm your safe
For those wondering if he's okay:,pic.twitter.com/nzj2WaPdGk
Are you ok?!?!
I hope you made it to a safe space.  I really do.
Stay safe brother. Complete stranger, just hoping to see you all get through this safely.

Anthony-I don’t know you, but I hope you were able to make it to a safe place, and that you are physically okay. Mentally & emotionally, I know that you’re far from that at the moment. Know that you have love and support as you need it.
Thank God! Glad to hear you're ok! Prayers were answered!
Praying for all of your safety.
God, please be with Anthony and keep him and others safe
I hope you're safe. You & your family are in my thoughts.
Please be ok Anthony
According to WBAL, Anthony and Phil are safe.

Praying with all my heart. This may go without saying but sometimes it’s difficult in panic and chaos: if you’ve gotten somewhere safe now don’t indicate your location on social media. I hope with every fiber you’re OK through this.
Hope you're alright!!
Hope you are okay. Sorry ppl are arguing and not helping you to stay strong. Let us know you are okay!
Dude send out a message and people start arguing. Damn people grow the F up!!!!  This man needs our help and nimrods are arguing who voted for who!!! You people are sick in the F’n head!!!!
Hope you are safe!
Hope this finds you well. Thoughts and prayers are never enough but please know you have mine.
https://,twitter.com/DTOhl/status/1,012425245427412992, ,…
May their sweet souls fly free with the angels and may you all be wrapped with peace and love
He's okay everyone! Proof-,https://,twitter.com/DTOhl/status/1,012425245427412992?s=19, ,…

The message of this disaster is the increase in moral decline happening today. It is a sign of the soon return of Jesus for His Church. Just like birth pains in a pregnant woman. Lawlessness, corruption, deception and insane behavior are increasing.
https://,twitter.com/AACOPD_PIO/sta,tus/1012414426438389763?s=19, ,…
He was sending for help! Not playing hashtag games! Jesus...
run or shoot back
IDIOT!
We all hope you are ok. So sorry you had to witness this shocking event.
I hope you are alright and safe
Stay safe!!!
This is terrifying
Anthony we are praying for you all. I’m worried about John McNamara, he’s one of the good ones. Worried about everyone.
Praying for you Anthony...
All of us here are TRULY concerned for YOU, Anthony!! Would you PLEASE let us know you're ok???
Omg! Are you ok?!
Let us know when you’re okay Anthony.
I hope you’re ok son...
Oh sweetheart. Text your mom when you can.
*hugs* is all I can offer but I’m thinking about all of y’all right now
Praying for your safety, Anthony.
Hope you’re safe buddy
pic.twitter.com/rje3Gl4xT0
I am so sorry that you came into work today and this is how it played out. We are with you

Hey man, we don’t know each other but I really hope you’re safe.
hoping you are safe.

Hope you are ok

Frightening! Hope you are safe.
Be safe Anthony and stay strong!
Praying!!!
smart thinking, great job
Hoping you’re safe
I hope you’re okay. My blood ran cold as I read this.
Husband driving on 97 now and even more police presence (unmarked cars as well).
Hope you are ok!
Praying you’re safe, Anthony! My son is interning down the road from you. I’ll pray for you all!!
Oh my god I'm so sorry for what you went through and for all the losses you suffered today.
Please get to a safe place.
Police say there may be more Shooters and there may be bombs. Get to a safe place.
Are you okay
Hope your safe. Amazes me the reporter vultures swooping in. Sadly before any law enforcement....
Prayers to all affected
God be with you and keep you safe!
You OK Anthony ?
Multiple media on this thread doing the unthinkable, asking a guy whos mortality is in immediate danger, in an active situation, to chat. Since 2016, MSM has become hot garbage
everyone who’s pissing st anthony because he posted on twitter and didn’t call the cops , The gunman was close . he’s in the hospital with an injury .
The police were there in 60 seconds.   Hope you're ok!!
my thoughts and prayers go out to you in Baltimore, Maryland..sad that trying to narrow odds can create so much pain. so deeply sorry.

Anthony, I am keeping ALL of you in my thoughts & prayers. My ♡ is breaking for ALL of you. May God watch over you ALL. I pray this stops here & there isn't anything else that will happen. I can't even imagine what U ALL R going through. This suspect truly is mentally ill. ♡
Please tell us you're safe. Omg, I'm so sorry. No place is safe in America with all these ammosexuals walking around.
Praying you are safe. xo
I hope you are okay; please update when you're safe to do so so we know you are alright
Please let us know if you're okay.
Hope u are OK God Bless all of you @ ,#,888Bestgate
Hoping, praying you're safe.
Hope you’re safe.
Cannot believe the hijacking going on here. Shame.
Stranger to you, but this tweet left me in tears. I truly hope you and your coworkers are all safe.
Awful. Stay safe.
Plz tell us if you are ok?
I hope you are ok! Praying for you!!!
